Help.#cdata:
[Syntax: CONNECTREMOTE=server-ID] 
    
Specifies the name of the server session that generated the spooled log and output 
to be retrieved. If only one session is active, server-ID can be omitted. If multiple 
server sessions are active and the option is omitted, the spooled log and output 
statements from the most recently accessed server session are retrieved and merged 
into the client Log and Output windows. You can find out which server session is the 
current session by examining the value that is assigned to the CONNECTREMOTE system 
option.
